entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GestureRecognizer Added to parent will not be block by Child of Frame type #6088
  • Label linebreakmode tests are failing on WinUI #6084
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Release Candidate 1 Doesn't work on macOS or iOS #6082
  • MAUI can't get file data from Windows Explorer by Drag&Drop and app will crash #6080
  • BlazorWebView on iOS uses APIs that require iOS 11 or newer #6078
  • Error NETSDK1147 workloads must be installed: maui-android #6077
  • Adding resx file for additional language gives an error while trying to build iOS project #6076
  • CollectionView taps not being processed #6075
  • Release Candidate Fails #6074
  • Obsolete warnings on Device are no longer correct #6072
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #6070
  • Rendering after IsVisible flip is messed up #6069
  • Externally hosted images cannot load on native apps #6067
  • Custom style not getting applied to Button #6064
  • Failure to initialize App MainPage on startup after updating to RC1 #6063
  • CarouselView difficult to swipe on Android #6062
  • AppShell Flyout Content Missing #6061
  • Row Height in Fill not working inside a ScrollView #6058
  • [RC1] Cannot build MAUI library #6052
  • Create ContentPage VS template not using proper namespace when adding new ContentPage inside a folder #6049
  • [Bug] Grid Spacing is not Pixel-Perfect #6047
  • Make IResourcesProvider public to be able to register this on the DI Container #6045
  • ERROR ITMS-90165: Invalid Provisioning Profile Signature #6044
  • [RC1] - iOS FontImageSource in AppShell TabBar Pixelation #6043
  • [BUG] Error NETSDK1005 after changes in .csproj file #6040
  • ApplicationDisplayVersion problem ITMS-90062 error #6037
  • The SearchHandler is not rendered on Windows #6036
  • Windows content page(C#) cannot be hot reloaded #6035
  • Debugging is harder than it need be #6034
  • Shell flyout item text sometimes blank #6033
  • View is overflowing when view parent has padding. #6032
  • [Bug] LayoutOptions Expand not work in HorizontalStackLayout and VerticalStackLayout #6031
  • [RC1] Label MaxLines doesn't work #6030

Closed

  • BarBackgroundColor and BarTextColor don't change color on Android #5590
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Android - APT2000 build error when project path contains non-ASCII symbols #5957
  • [6.0.300-rc.1] iOS debugging/hot reload doesn't work. "XAML Hot Reload encountered a problem and failed to start." #6055
  • Label not getting resized to the change in Text length on Android #6066
  • Android - APT2126 XML files not found when moving built project to a different path #5956
  • Error with Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite #6050
  • Maui and Grpc cannot work together on MacOS? #6057
  • DisplayAlert bug #4253
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • .NET Maui RC1 On Click counter not show Android #6073
  • Install MAUI RC1 workloads fails on Mac #6038
  • MauiAppBuilder' does not contain a definition for 'RegisterBlazorMauiWebView' #6056
  • BlazorWebView API review: Open questions #5904
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Unable to build Windows class libraries with dotnet build #5886
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • DynamicResource binding not working #5044
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor of Entry not work #6029
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5927

PullRequests

Created

  • Leave the content panel active on the Windows scrollview at all times #6087
  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085
    area/layout 🔲
  • Use the correct text in the [Obsolete] attributes #6079
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [X] Remove hacks for StaticResourceExtension #6065
    area/Xaml </>
  • Avoid notify changes from a null or disposed control #6060
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix FlowDirection issue #6054
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/localization
  • [Android] Fix crash adding/removing SwipeItems dynamically in the SwipeView #6053
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/SwipeView
  • Made IResourceProvider public #6046
    area/hosting 🧩

Merged

  • Update ASP.NET Core Packages to 6.0.4 And Remove Coherent Dependency #6014
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Always use the MSIX tooling #6068
    area/single project ☝️, p/0, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Make RC1 current version in bug report template #6039
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Update samples in Gallery to use BackgroundColor and Background properties everywhere #6042
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5979
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/publishing 🏁
  • Remove downcasts in BlazorWebView #5984
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Add public api analyzer to Maui.Core #6003
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Implement iOSPlatform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [workload] Merge Dependencies and Extensions packs #5918
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Create Flyout.Details inside Fragment #6023
    area/navigation 🧭, partner/android
  • [iOS] Add vertical text alignment to Editor #5996
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
